name: Association of Young Azerbaijani Professionals in Europe
goal: AYAPE is an independent non-profit organization that aims at further contributing to the process of European integration of the South Caucasus and Central Asia by using the synergy of network of young professionals in Europe, the South Caucasus and Central Asia with key movers and shakers in Brussels.  AYAPE is based on a network of members who share the ideas of the organization. We bring value to members through networking and collaboration opportunities and joint projects. In the same time we are enlarging our network with organisations and individuals that share the values and objectives of AYAPE in order to address different issues on regional and European level.
interests: Culture, Culture and media, Education and training, Enlargement, European Neighbourhood Policy, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Youth
euInitiatives:
- CULT. MFF - ERASMUS The Union Programme for Education, Training, Youth and Sport
- AFET. Review of the European Neighbourhood Policy
- DEVE. European Fund for Sustainable Development
- ITRE. Horizon Europe, Framework Programme for Research and Innovation 2021-2027
